title: NPE on CompositionLayer
body:
Hi!
This has been happening recently, last release included:

Fatal Exception: java.lang.NullPointerException
       at com.airbnb.lottie.model.layer.CompositionLayer.<init>(SourceFile:8120)
       at com.airbnb.lottie.LottieDrawable.b(SourceFile:201)
       at com.airbnb.lottie.LottieAnimationView.setComposition(SourceFile:11164)

I find out that code revision 3867cdd is match the crash trace from the Fabric 
Crashlytics log.
`Fatal Exception: java.lang.NullPointerException
com.airbnb.lottie.model.layer.CompositionLayer. (CompositionLayer.java:70)
  | com.airbnb.lottie.LottieDrawable.buildCompositionLayer (LottieDrawable.java:195)
  | com.airbnb.lottie.LottieDrawable.setComposition (LottieDrawable.java:156)
  | com.airbnb.lottie.LottieAnimationView.setComposition (LottieAnimationView.java:461)
  | com.airbnb.lottie.LottieAnimationView$3.onCompositionLoaded (LottieAnimationView.java:426)
  | com.airbnb.lottie.model.FileCompositionLoader.onPostExecute (FileCompositionLoader.java:24)
  | com.airbnb.lottie.model.FileCompositionLoader.onPostExecute (FileCompositionLoader.java:10)`

The crashed code should be

It looks like `layerView.getLayerModel()` was null at some time.

```
Exception java.lang.NullPointerException: layerView is null!
com.airbnb.lottie.model.layer.CompositionLayer.addValueCallback (CompositionLayer.java)

android.os.Handler.dispatchMessage (Handler.java:110)
android.os.Looper.loop (Looper.java:193)
android.app.ActivityThread.main (ActivityThread.java:5299)
java.lang.reflect.Method.invokeNative (Method.java)
java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke (Method.java:515)

com.android.internal.os.ZygoteInit.main (ZygoteInit.java:645)
dalvik.system.NativeStart.main (NativeStart.java)
```

It only happens on devices running API 19 (4.4), not all the time apparently and I don't know for which annimation in perticular as this is the only stacktrace I have (happens on various screens).

Previously I was setting the `app:lottie_fileName ` in XML and got the error when the whole view inflates, now I moved the `setAnimation()` in code at runtime with a try catch block to maybe intercept this exception and simply not show the animation, but looks like it doesn't work either. 

This is the version I'm using:
```
implementation('com.airbnb.android:lottie:2.5.0-beta1') {
    exclude group: 'com.android.support'
}
```
